{{Disambiguation}}

'''Snow''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Blocks ===
* {{BlockLink|Snow}} - A layer of snow that accumulates during snowy weather.
* {{BlockLink|Snow Block}} - A full block of snow.
* {{BlockLink|Powder Snow}} - A type of snow that slows entities and inflicts freezing damage.

=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Snowball}} - An item harvested from snow and snow blocks, which can be thrown.
* {{ItemLink|Powder Snow Bucket}} - An item that holds powder snow.

=== Weather ===
* {{EnvLink|Snowfall}} - A type of weather that occurs in snowy biomes, and at high [[altitude]] in cold biomes.
